event.title: was established as a military outpost then given town status in 1833

data.event: The municipality is centered on the small town of Arroyo Seco, which was established as a military outpost then given town status in 1833 under the name of Villa de Guadalupe before changing to its current name.
The town gained municipal status in 1931.

event.title: became the seat of the municipality of the same name in 1931

data.event: It became the seat of the municipality of the same name in 1931.
